General.Name: Southern Province Cement Co.
General.Description: Southern Province Cement Company engages in the manufacture, production and sale of cement, clinker, and its derivatives and accessories in Saudi Arabia. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Abha, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: King Fahad Road, Abha, Saudi Arabia, 62581
